description:
Year 1987: Japan. A young man who is a descendant of the Joestar clan, Jotaro Kujo, is being held in a cell. He tells his mother, Holly, that he is being possessed by an evil spirit, so she asks her father, Joseph Joestar for help. Joseph immediately goes to Japan along with his friend, Avdol and go to Jotaro, explaining that he knows everything about the evil spirit. His explanation brings their ominous family history to light...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Man Possessed by an Evil Spirit
悪霊にとりつかれた男
